title: HAP 49 - Let Your Motto Be Resistance - Henry Highland Garnet
itunes:title: HAP 49 - Let Your Motto Be Resistance - Henry Highland Garnet
description: Henry Highland Garnet encourages, or actually demands, that enslaved Americans throw off their chains and debates Douglass over how best to resist slavery.
content:encoded: Henry Highland Garnet encourages, or actually demands, that enslaved Americans throw off their chains and debates Douglass over how best to resist slavery.

itunes:summary: Henry Highland Garnet encourages, or actually demands, that enslaved Americans throw off their chains and debates Douglass over how best to resist slavery.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
